mapper.sql: id, business_code AS businessCode, process_name AS title, apply_type AS applyType, pc_icon AS pcIcon, effective_source AS effectiveSource, is_son AS isSon, look_url AS lookUrl, submit_url AS submitUrl, condition_url AS conditionUrl, parent_id AS parentId, application_url AS applicationUrl, route, process_key AS processKey, permissions_code AS permissionsCode, is_del AS isDel, create_user_id AS createUserId, create_time AS createTime, update_user AS updateUser, update_time AS updateTime, is_all AS isAll, state, sort, source
mapper.select:
select s.id as id, s.process_name as title, s.route as route, s.process_key as processKey, s.effective_source as effectiveSource, s.pc_icon as pcIcon, s.apply_type as applyType, s.permissions_code as permissionsCode, (SELECT process_type_name from bpm_process_category where id = (SELECT category_id from bpm_process_application_type where application_id=s.id and is_del=0 order by create_time desc LIMIT 1 )) as processTypeName, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(entrance) from bpm_process_category where id in (SELECT category_id from bpm_process_application_type where application_id=s.id and is_del=0 )) as entrance, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(id) from bpm_process_category where id in (SELECT category_id from bpm_process_application_type where application_id=s.id and is_del=0 )) as typeIds from bpm_process_app_application s where s.is_del=0 and s.business_code is null
and s.process_name like CONCAT('%', #{title},'%')

select s.id as id, p.name as businessName, p.id as businessPartyId, s.process_name as title, s.business_code as businessCode, s.apply_type as applyType, s.pc_icon as pcIcon, s.effective_source as effectiveSource, s.is_son as isSon, s.look_url as lookUrl, s.submit_url as submitUrl, s.condition_url as conditionUrl, s.parent_id as parentId, s.application_url as applicationUrl, s.route as route, s.process_key as processKey, s.permissions_code as permissionsCode, s.create_user_id as createUserId, s.create_time as createTime from bpm_process_app_application s left join t_out_side_bpm_business_party p on s.business_code = p.business_party_mark where s.is_del=0
order by s.create_time desc
select id, process_key AS processKey, process_name AS processName, route,effective_source AS effectiveSource from bpm_process_app_application where is_del = 0 AND process_key =''

SELECT t.id as id, a.process_key as processKey, a.process_name as title FROM bpm_process_app_application a left join bpm_process_application_type t on t.application_id=a.id WHERE a.is_del = 0 and t.is_del=0 and a.apply_type = 1 and t.category_id = #{id} and t.visble_state = 1 order by t.sort asc

select s.id as id, p.name as businessName, p.id as businessPartyId, s.process_name as title, s.business_code as businessCode, s.apply_type as applyType, s.pc_icon as pcIcon, s.effective_source as effectiveSource, s.is_son as isSon, s.look_url as lookUrl, s.submit_url as submitUrl, s.condition_url as conditionUrl, s.user_request_uri as userRequestUri, s.role_request_uri as roleRequestUri, s.parent_id as parentId, s.application_url as applicationUrl, s.route as route, s.process_key as processKey, s.permissions_code as permissionsCode, s.create_user_id as createUserId, s.create_time as createTime from bpm_process_app_application s left join t_out_side_bpm_business_party p on s.business_code = p.business_party_mark where s.is_del=0 and p.business_party_mark = #{businessPartyMark} order by s.create_time desc
